name: Mig Busters
overview: Climb into the cockpit of your devastating F16 fighter, fire up the engines and take to the skies. In MiG Busters you fly this aircraft on a series of deadly missions over an unspecified North African terrorist nation. Don't expect to be given an easy time as you will have to contend with Soviet built MiG fighters, gunship helicopters and various ground defence installations. MiG Busters comprises of six deadly missions. Upon completion of each mission your aircraft will land on automatic pilot and your plane will be fitted with an extra piece of military hardware. Extra ammunition may be collected from the crates situated at ground level, simply fly into them to replenish your supply.
